snippet: With a warm approach to Modernist ideals, the duo behind Apparatus studio seem to have one bright idea after another.
abstract: Gabriel Hendifar and Jeremy Anderson, founders of lighting design studio Apparatus, incorporate their passion for modernist furniture and objects in their shared Park Slope, Brooklyn, apartment.
lead_paragraph: With a warm approach to Modernist ideals, the duo behind Apparatus studio seem to have one bright idea after another.

headline.main: Inside the Inspired Home of Two Brooklyn Lighting Designers
